alert.note: Alert for Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 23 at 3:33AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chill readings ranging from 15 to 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Increased potential for frostbite and hypothermia. Frostbite may occur on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If heading outside for an extended period of time, exercise caution and wear appropriate clothing. Wear multiple layers of loose fitting clothing, including a hat and gloves.
